Encoders Notes
I made the subtitles by translating
the hardcoded french subtitles in google translate.
As we all know google translate isnt great so it
might not make sense in some places but i did the best i could.
I couldnt find any hardcoded french subtitles after 35 minutes.
Once i made the subtitles i Then dropped the source into vdubmod.
There i lowered the brightness,
increased the contrast & saturation.
After that i lightly de-noised & sharpened it,
changed the colours with a rgb eq.
Finaly i Hardcoded the subtitles.
The video is prety good.
It goes blurry a few times, but apart from that its fine.
The audio isnt to bad.
Check the sample first to make sure your happy with the quality.
Enjoy the film.
